title: Handle a Parts Warranty Claim
description: A part that was recently replaced on a truck has failed prematurely. The fleet manager needs to file a warranty claim with the part supplier.

tasks.description: Identify the failed part and find the original repair order where it was installed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager finds the record of the initial repair.

tasks.description: Check the warranty terms for that part to confirm it is still covered.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager confirms the part is under warranty.

tasks.description: Initiate a warranty claim with the supplier, providing the original purchase and installation details.
tasks.expected_outcome: A claim is filed with the supplier.

tasks.description: The supplier approves the claim and ships a replacement part at no charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: The company receives a free replacement part.
